question: セリフ
sourceAnswer:
serif
<read>せりふ</read>|<read>かはく</read>|<read>だいし</read>:<tag><ja>台詞</ja></tag>:: speech/words/one's-lines/remarks
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>part of speech</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji> spits out <vocabulary>speech</vocabulary>es and <vocabulary>words</vocabulary>. It's all the machine is programmed to do.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
The reading for this is an exception. Here's a mnemonic to help you:

The only font the machine can print <vocabulary>speech</vocabulary>es in is <reading>serif</reading> font (<ja>せりふ</ja>).
